summary: A crippled circus acrobat is torn emotionally between two ambitious young trapeze artists, one a talented young American and a less-gifted but beautiful Italian.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Tony Curtis|Gina Lollobrigida|Katy Jurado|Thomas Gomez|Johnny Puleo|Minor Watson|Gérard Landry|Jean-Pierre Kérien|Sidney James|Gimma Boys|Los Arriolas|Gamil Ratib|Pierre Tabard|Edward Hagopian|Fay Alexander|Serge Bento|Paul Bonifas|Roland Carey|Mme Felco Cipriano|Betty Codreano|Henri Coutet|Hubert de Lapparent|Lucien Desagneaux|Paul Faivre|Gabrielle Fontan|Édouard Francomme|Willy Krause|Sylvain Levignac|Rico Lopez|Sally Marlowe|Mylos|Guy Provost|Michel Thomass|Edward Ward|Joe Warfield|Achille Zavatta
title: Trapecio
